roleset.name: cause (blood) to stop seeping

example.name: the one example
example.text: Thrombinar, [a drug]-1 used *trace*-1 *trace*-1 to stanch bleeding, was sold to Jones Medical Industries Inc., St. Louis.

roleset.note: STANCH-V NOTES: Usually 'staunch'. Not that that's very common either. (from stanch.01-v)
